name: Prone
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
--ak.limbs.ParseonLine()
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then
	EchoForMajorAff("PRONE")
	OppGainedAff("prone")
end
matches: ^Sweeping out with a blade hand, [\w'\-]+l strikes at the back of ([\w'\-]+)'s knee\.$
^Drawing an enormous breath\, [\w'\-]+ exhales\, expelling a gale of wind with such force that ([\w'\-]+) is knocked over\.$
^([\w'\-]+) is knocked forcefully off (?:her|his) feet by the impact of [\w'\-]+\'s huge tail\.$
^([\w'\-]+)\'s eyes close suddenly as (?:she|he) falls asleep\.$
^([\w'\-]+) is knocked off h(?:is|er) feet by the heaving ground\.$
^[\w'\-]+ throws (?:his|her) palms forward, releasing a stream of deadly blue light to cripple ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^Drawing an enormous breath, you exhale, expelling a gale of wind with such force that ([\w'\-]+) is
([\w'\-]+) is knocked forcefully off (?:his|her) feet by the impact of your huge tail\.$
^You hear two loud snaps and see ([\w'\-]+) fall to the ground\.$
^You knock the legs out from under ([\w'\-]+) and send (him|her) sprawling\.$
^You duck low and smash your shield into the knees of ([\w'\-]+)\, causing them to buckle underneath (?:her|him)\.$
^Stepping forward, you grab the useless .* of ([\w'\-]+), wrench (him|her) violently forward, and throw (him|her) to the ground\.$
^You lunge downward, slamming the edge of .+ into the shins of ([\w'\-]+)\.
^You swiftly sweep ([\w'\-]+) feet out from beneath
^An .* tangles itself in the legs of ([\w'\-]+)\, sending (her|him) sprawling to the ground\.$
^A .* tangles itself in the legs of ([\w'\-]+)\, sending (her|him) sprawling to the ground\.$
^Dropping into a low crouch\, you expertly tangle .* with the legs of ([\w'\-]+)\, sending [\w'\-]+ sprawling\.$
^The staff sweeps the legs out from under ([\w'\-]+)\, sending [\w'\-]+ sprawling\.$
^The instep of your foot smashes into the [\w'\-]+ underarm of ([\w'\-]+)\, throwing [\w'\-]+ from [\w'\-]+ feet and sending [\w'\-]+ spinning to the ground\.$
^[\w'\-]+ drops low\, tangling .+ with the legs of ([\w'\-]+) and sending [\w'\-]+ sprawling\.$
^[\w'\-]+ drops to the floor and sweeps [\w'\-]+ legs round at ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^([\w'\-]+) slips on a thin layer of fluid\, [\w'\-]+ feet flying out from under [\w'\-]+\.$
^Water thunders down upon ([\w'\-]+)\, driving [\w'\-]+ relentlessly to [\w'\-]+ knees\.$
^The [\w'\-]+ leg of ([\w'\-]+) buckles under the impact\, and [\w'\-]+ goes sprawling\.$
^[\w'\-]+ lunges downward, slamming theedge of .* into the shins of ([\w'\-]+)\.$
^Sweeping out with a blade hand\, [\w'\-]+ strikes at the back of ([\w'\-]+)\'s knee\.$
^As your blow cuts deeply into the leg of ([\w'\-]+)\, you drive savagely forward\, taking [\w'\-]+ clean off [\w'\-]+ feet\.$
^You strike a savage blow with your quarterstaff at (\w+)\'s damaged leg\, bringing \w+ crashing to the ground\.$
^(\w+) is flung violently from \w+ feet\.$
^([\w'\-]+) has already fallen to the ground\.$
